rooms.name: A
rooms.description: You are standing in a room. There are three doors. One is to the north, one is to the east, one is to the west. Which direction do you want to go?

rooms.name: B
rooms.description: You are standing in a room. There are three doors. One is to the east, one to the north, and one to the west. Which direction do you want to go?

rooms.name: C
rooms.description: You are standing in a room. There is only one exit, to the east. Which direction do you choose?

rooms.name: D
rooms.description: You are standing in a room. There are two exits. One to the north, and one to the south. Which direction do you choose?

rooms.name: E
rooms.description: You are standing in a room. There are two exits. One is to the east, and the other is to the south. Which direction do you choose?

rooms.name: F
rooms.description: You are in a room. There is only one exit - you must go back west.

rooms.name: G
rooms.description: You are in a room with two exits. One is to the north, and one to the south. Which one do you choose?

rooms.name: H
rooms.description: You are in a room with two exits. One is to the east, and one to the south. Which direction do you choose?

rooms.name: I
rooms.direction: You are in a room. There are two exits - one to the west, and one to the east. Which direction do you choose?

rooms.name: J
rooms.direction: You are in a room with two exits - one west, and one east. Which do you choose?

rooms.name: K
rooms.description: You are in the treasure room!
